  i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   A   m   a   z   o   n   U   K   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   .   u   k   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;                            a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   r   b   x   P   v   b   1   W   X   C   7   K   T   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   r   b   x   P   v   b   1   W   X   C   7   K   T   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   A   m   a   z   o   n   U   K   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   e   m   a   i   l   "   &gt;            A   .   o   n   .   l   o   a   d   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {

                   v   a   r       h   a   s   h   I   n   d   e   x   ;

                   i   f       (   h   a   s   h   V   a   l   u   e       !   =       "   "       &amp;&amp;        h   a   s   h   I   n   d   e   x       &gt;       -   1   )       {

                   }   
       }   )   ;

                   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   p   r   i   m   a   r   y       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   c   o   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   c   a   r   t   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       B   a   s   k   e   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   o   v   e   r   =   "   S   e   l   e   c   t       &amp;l   t   ;                                    s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   f   l   o   a   t   -   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   s   :   /   /   c   a   t   a   l   o   g   -   r   e   t   a   i   l   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   .   u   k   /   a   b   i   s   /   s   y   h   /   D   i   s   p   l   a   y   C   o   n   d   i   t   i   o   n   /   r   e   f   =   d   p   _   s   d   p   _   s   e   l   l   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   l   i   d   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   a   s   i   n   =   B   0   0   7   3   G   I   N   0   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   d   =   A   M   Z   D   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   r   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   q   i   d   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   l   i   i   d   =   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   "       r   o   l   e   =   "   b   u   t   t   o   n   "   &gt;

                                           v   a   r       p       =       p   r   e   c   a   c   h   e   D   e   t   a   i   l   I   m   a   g   e   s   ,   
                                                           $       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   ;   
                                           i   f       (   p   )       {   
                                                   v   a   r       s   e   l   e   c   t   o   r       =       "   #   p   u   r   c   h   a   s   e   B   u   t   t   o   n   W   r   a   p   p   e   r   "   ;   
                                                   v   a   r       i   m   g   E   l   e   m   s       =       $   (   s   e   l   e   c   t   o   r   )   .   f   i   n   d   (   "   a       &gt;       d   i   v       &gt;       i   m   g   "   )   ;   
                                                   v   a   r       p   g   s   ,       i   m   g   s       =       [   ]   ,       i       =       i   m   g   E   l   e   m   s   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;   
                                                   w   h   i   l   e       (   i   -   -       &gt;       0   )       {   
                                                           i   m   g   s   [   i   ]       =       $   (   i   m   g   E   l   e   m   s   [   i   ]   )   .   a   t   t   r   (   '   s   r   c   '   )   ;   
                                                   }   
                                                   p   (   i   m   g   s   ,   p   g   s   )   ;   
                                           }   
                                           /   /       u   n   b   i   n   d       l   i   s   t   e   n   i   n   g       o   n       s   c   r   o   l   l       o   n   c   e       p   r   e   -   c   a   c   h   i   n   g       c   o   m   p   l   e   t   e   d   
                                           $   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   .   u   n   b   i   n   d   (   '   s   c   r   o   l   l   '   ,       o   n   S   c   r   o   l   l   P   r   e   c   a   c   h   e   )   ;       
                                           r   e   t   u   r   n   ;   
                                   }   
                                   p   e   n   d   i   n   g       =       0   ;       /   /   p   r   e   c   a   c   h   e       n   o   t       e   x   e   c   u   t   e       y   e   t   ,       w   a   i   t       n   e   x   t       i   n   v   o   k   e   
                                   l   a   s   t   C   h   e   c   k       =       n   e   w       D   a   t   e   (   )   .   g   e   t   T   i   m   e   (   )   ;   
                           }   ;   
                           s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   u   ,       c   h   e   c   k   D   e   l   a   y   )   ;   
                           r   e   t   u   r   n   ;   
                   }   ;   
                   
                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   .   b   i   n   d   (   '   s   c   r   o   l   l   '   ,       o   n   S   c   r   o   l   l   P   r   e   c   a   c   h   e   )   ;   
           }   )   ;   
   }
